h4001.definition: from {{h947}}; a trampling; treading (trodden) down (under foot).

h4003.definition: from the same as {{h950}}; emptiness; void.

h4004.definition: from {{h977}}; select, i.e. well fortified; choice.

h4005.definition: from {{h977}}; select, i.e. best; choice(-st), chosen.

h4006.definition: the same as {{h4005}}; Mibchar, an Israelite; Mibhar.

h4007.definition: or מֶבָּט; from {{h5027}}; something expected, i.e. (abstractly) expectation; expectation.

h4008.definition: from {{h981}}; a rash utterance (hasty vow); (that which...) uttered (out of).

h4009.definition: from {{h982}}; properly, a refuge, i.e. (objective) security, or (subjective) assurance; confidence, hope, sure, trust.

h4010.definition: from {{h1082}}; desistance (or rather desolation); comfort self.

h4012.definition: from {{h1129}}; built up; Mebunnai, an Israelite; Mebunnai.

h4013.definition: also (in plural) feminine (Daniel 11:l5) מִבְצָרָה; from {{h1219}}; a fortification, castle, or fortified city; figuratively, a defender; (de-, most) fenced, fortress, (most) strong (hold).

h4014.definition: the same as {{h4013}}; Mibtsar, an Idumaean; Mibzar.

h4017.definition: from the same as {{h1314}}; fragrant; Mibsam, the name of an Ishmaelite and of an Israelite; Mibsam.

h4019.definition: from the same as {{h1378}}; stiffening; Magbish, an Israelite, or a place in Palestine; Magbish.

h4021.definition: from the same as {{h1389}}; a cap (as hemispherical); bonnet.

h4022.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to be eminent; properly, a distinguished thing; hence something valuable, as a product or fruit; pleasant, precious fruit (thing).

h4023.definition: (Zechariah {{h12}}) or מְגִדּוֹ; from {{h1413}}; rendezvous; Megiddon or Megiddo, a place in Palestine; Megiddo, Megiddon.

h4024.definition: or מִגְדֹּל; probably of Egyptian origin; Migdol, a place in Egypt; Migdol, tower.

h4025.definition: from {{h4022}} and {{h410}}; preciousness of God; Magdiel, an Idumaean; Magdiel.

h4026.definition: also (in plural) feminine מִגְדָּלָה; from {{h1431}}; a tower (from its size or height); by analogy, a rostrum; figuratively, a (pyramidal) bed of flowers; castle, flower, tower. Compare the names following.

h4027.definition: from {{h4026}} and {{h410}}; tower of God; Migdal-El, a place in Palestine; Migdal-el.

h4028.definition: from {{h4026}} and {{h1408}}; tower of Fortune; Migdal-Gad, a place in Palestine; Migdal-gad.

h4029.definition: from {{h4026}} and {{h5739}}; tower of a flock; Migdal-Eder, a place in Palestine; Migdal-eder, tower of the flock.

h4030.definition: from the same as {{h4022}}; preciousness, i.e. a gem; precious thing, present.

h4031.definition: from {{h1463}}; Magog, a son of Japheth; also a barbarous northern region; Magog.

h4032.definition: or (Lamentations 2:22) מָגוּר; from {{h1481}} in the sense of fearing; a fright (objective or subjective); fear, terror. Compare {{h4036}}.

h4033.definition: or מָגֻר; from {{h1481}} in the sense of lodging; a temporary abode; by extension, a permanent residence; dwelling, pilgrimage, where sojourn, be a stranger. Compare {{h4032}}.

h4035.definition: feminine of {{h4032}} or of {{h4033}}; a fright; also a granary; barn, fear.

h4036.definition: from {{h4032}} and {{h5439}} with the preposition inserted; affright from around; Magor-mis-Sabib, a symbolic name of Pashur; Magormissabib.

h4037.definition: from {{h1504}}; a cutting implement, i.e. a blade; axe.

h4038.definition: from an unused root meaning to reap; a sickle; sickle.

h4041.definition: from the same as {{h1571}}; properly, accumulation, i.e. impulse or direction; sup up.

h4042.definition: a denominative from {{h4043}}; properly, to shield; encompass with; figuratively, to rescue, to hand safely over (i.e. surrender); deliver.

h4043.definition: also (in plural) feminine מְגִנָּה; from {{h1598}}; a shield (i.e. the small one or buckler); figuratively, a protector; also the scaly hide of the crocodile; × armed, buckler, defence, ruler,   scale, shield.

h4044.definition: from {{h4042}}; a covering (in a bad sense), i.e. blindness or obduracy; sorrow. See also {{h4043}}.

h4046.definition: from {{h5062}}; a pestilence; by analogy, defeat; (× be) plague(-d), slaughter, stroke.

h4047.definition: apparently from {{h1479}} or {{h5062}} and {{h6211}}; exterminator of (the) moth; Magpiash, an Israelite; Magpiash.

h4048.definition: a primitive root; to yield up; intensively, to precipitate; cast down, terror.

h4051.definition: from {{h4048}}; precipice; Migron, a place in Palestine; Migron.

h4052.definition: from {{h1639}}; a ledge or offset; narrowed rest.

h4053.definition: from {{h1640}}; something thrown off (by the spade), i.e. a clod; clod.

h4054.definition: also (in plural) feminine (Ezekiel 27:28) מִגְרָשָׁה; from {{h1644}}; a suburb (i.e. open country whither flocks are driven from pasture); hence, the area around a building, or the margin of the sea; cast out, suburb.

h4055.definition: or מֵד; from {{h4058}}; properly, extent, i.e. height; also a measure; by implication, a vesture (as measured); also a carpet; armour, clothes, garment, judgment, measure, raiment, stature.

h4057.definition: from {{h1696}} in the sense of driving; a pasture (i.e. open field, whither cattle are driven); by implication, a desert; also speech (including its organs); desert, south, speech, wilderness.

h4058.definition: a primitive root; properly, to stretch; by implication, to measure (as if by stretching a line); figuratively, to be extended; measure, mete, stretch self.

h4060.definition: feminine of {{h4055}}; properly, extension, i.e. height or breadth; also a measure (including its standard); hence a portion (as measured) or a vestment; specifically, tribute (as measured); garment, measure(-ing, meteyard, piece, size, (great) stature, tribute, wide.

h4061.definition: (Aramaic) or מִנְדָּה; (Aramaic), corresponding to {{h4060}}; tribute in money; toll, tribute.

h4062.definition: perhaps from the equivalent of {{h1722}}; goldmaking, i.e. exactness; golden city.

h4063.definition: from an unused root meaning to stretch; properly, extent, i.e. measure; by implication, a dress (as measured); garment.

h4066.definition: from {{h1777}}; a contest or quarrel; brawling, contention(-ous), discord, strife. Compare {{h4079}}, {{h4090}}.

h4067.definition: from the same as {{h4063}}; extensiveness, i.e. height; stature.

h4068.definition: the same as {{h4067}}; Madon, a place in Palestine; Madon.

h4069.definition: or מַדֻּעַ; from {{h4100}} and the passive participle of {{h3045}}; what (is) known?; i.e. (by implication) (adverbially) why?; how, wherefore, why.

h4070.definition: (Aramaic) or מְדֹר; (Aramaic), or מְדָר; (Aramaic), from {{h1753}}; a dwelling; dwelling.

h4071.definition: or מְדֻרָה; from {{h1752}} in the sense of accumulation; a pile of fuel; pile (for fire).

h4073.definition: from {{h1765}}; a push, i.e. ruin; overthrow.

h4074.definition: of foreign derivation; Madai, a country of central Asia; Madai, Medes, Media.

h4075.definition: patrial from {{h4074}}; a Madian or native of Madai; Mede.

h4078.definition: from {{h4100}} and {{h1767}}; what (is) enough, i.e. sufficiently; sufficiently.

h4080.definition: the same as {{h4079}}; Midjan, a son of Abraham; also his country and (collectively) his descendants; Midian, Midianite.

h4082.definition: from {{h1777}}; properly, a judgeship, i.e. jurisdiction; by implication, a district (as ruled by a judge); generally, a region; (× every) province.

h4084.definition: patronymical or patrial from {{h4080}}; a Midjanite or descendant (native) of Midjan; Midianite. Compare {{h4092}}.

h4086.definition: from the same as {{h1828}}; dunghill; Madmen, a place in Palestine; Madmen.

h4087.definition: feminine from the same as {{h1828}}; a dunghill; dunghill.

h4088.definition: the same as {{h4087}}; Madmenah, a place in Palestine; Madmenah.

h4089.definition: a variation for {{h4087}}; Madmannah, a place in Palestine; Madmannah.

h4091.definition: the same as {{h4090}}; Medan, a son of Abraham; Medan.

h4093.definition: or מַדַּע; from {{h3045}}; intelligence or consciousness; knowledge, science, thought.

h4095.definition: from an unused root meaning to step; properly, a step; by implication, a steep or inaccessible place; stair, steep place.

h4096.definition: from {{h1869}}; a treading, i.e. a place for stepping on; (foot-) breadth.

h4097.definition: from {{h1875}}; properly, an investigation, i.e. (by implication) a treatise or elaborate compilation; story.

h4098.definition: from {{h1758}}; a threshing, i.e. (concretely and figuratively) down-trodden people; threshing.

h4099.definition: of Persian origin; Medatha, the father of Haman; Hammedatha (including the article).

h4100.definition: or מַה; or מָ; or מַ; also מֶה; a primitive particle; properly, interrogative what? (including how?why?when?); but also exclamation, what! (including how!), or indefinitely what (including whatever, and even relatively, that which); often used with prefixes in various adverbial or conjunctive senses; how (long, oft, (-soever)), (no-) thing, what (end, good, purpose, thing), whereby(-fore, -in, -to, -with), (for) why.
